body_html: @F3PiX I think the teams app might need some restructuring anyway, and the navbar should reflect that :) as Carsten pointed out it's difficult when the menu items change throughout the summer according to the different phases, however I think we could definitely change it into a 'real' bootstrap navbar. 👍
body_text: @F3PiX I think the teams app might need some restructuring anyway, and the navbar should reflect that :) as Carsten pointed out it's difficult when the menu items change throughout the summer according to the different phases, however I think we could definitely change it into a 'real' bootstrap navbar. 👍
body: @F3PiX I think the teams app might need some restructuring anyway, and the navbar should reflect that :) as Carsten pointed out it's difficult when the menu items change throughout the summer according to the different phases, however I think we could definitely change it into a 'real' bootstrap navbar. :+1:
